messages.title: Our Environment must be protected
messages.content: This General Election could be the last chance we have to stop climate change in its tracks.

messages.title: Air quality and your health
messages.content: Traffic fumes increase the risks of child pneumonia. Top consultant announces breakthrough study.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: YES to cheap, clean renewable energy. NO to expensive and unsafe nuclear power.
A Green Road Out of Recession - Investing in green technology means jobs that last and a more sustainable economy for the future.
Steven Lambert and the Lib Dems will oppose the Tory plans for high-speed rail which would devastate local communities and the environment.

issues.economy: We have a huge opportunity to get people off the benefits and into generation technology.
issues.environment: Our environment must be protected. Conserving the environment is the right and practical thing to do for our local area.
issues.health: Air quality is linked to children's health risks.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steven said 'the Lib Dems are the only party that are truly acting as guardians for our precious green spaces, air quality and community.'

contactInformation.address: printed, published and promoted by Mike Smith on behalf of Steven Lambert and Aylesbury Liberal Democrats, all at Castle Street, Aylesbury HP20 2RE

endorsements.endorsement: Support for Steven Lambert as the candidate for Aylesbury.
